text: The other day I was on a treasure hunt when I found this red X on the ground.
I started digging and found this chest.
When I opened it, I could not believe what I found.
I went straight home to use it.
And when I got on eBay, I could not believe what I saw.
A rare Joyide watermelon wedge that looks like a flame.
This has to be a scam.
If it is legit, my plan is to put it in this frame.
A few days later, it came in the there it was, a watermelon wedge flame.
I put it down so I could grab the frame, but when I looked up to grab the wedge, it was gone.
I look around the room in horror.
There goes joy How would you lay me
